title: Mandy Moore's husband Taylor Goldsmith pens sweetest note following 2019 Emmys
text:
I'm not crying, you are!

Interested in Emmy Awards? Add Emmy Awards as an interest to stay up to date on the latest Emmy Awards news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

Grab the tissues for this adorable story featuring Mandy Moore and her husband Taylor Goldsmith.

The musician put all other husbands to shame when she posted a photo of the duo last night at the 2019 Emmys.

"If you have ever found yourself wondering who the luckiest guy in the world could possibly be, consider your question answered," he wrote.

Moore had been up for an award last night, but lost to Jodie Comer from “Killing Eve.”

In his note, Goldsmith continued, "I love you @mandymooremm. Amazing to watch you do your thing at the Emmys tonight. Couldn’t have felt prouder. Thanks for letting me tag along."

In her Instagram feed from Sunday night, Moore shared another fun pic with her co-star Susan Kelechi Watson, both of whom wore similar dresses.

"Always happy to be here and twinning with my girl," she wrote, next to the duo laughing.

But of course she had to thank her doting husband.

"A special note of gratitude to 💓 and most handsome date @taylordawesgoldsmith for having my back and being the best wingman at these crazy awards shows," she wrote.
description: Grab the tissues for this adorable story featuring Mandy Moore and her husband Taylor Goldsmith after the 2019 Emmys.
